data.title: Tommy Davidson - New Single and New Show!
data.meta_description: If you've only heard Tommy Davidson on the radio (listen to his new single "Kid Zero" here), you'll have to check out his work as a comedian and actor! He's headlining a cast of talented actors a new scripted series "Union," which premiered this past month. The new show is available on the DCE Global Streaming Network, which can be downloaded as a channel on Apple TV, Amazon Fire TV, or Roku. You can also find it in the Apple or Android app store listed as "DCE TV" or "DCE Network." Read more ab
data.text:
If you've only heard Tommy Davidson on the radio (listen to his new single "Kid Zero" here), you'll have to check out his work as a comedian and actor! He's headlining a cast of talented actors a new scripted series "Union," which premiered this past month.

The new show is available on the DCE Global Streaming Network, which can be downloaded as a channel on Apple TV, Amazon Fire TV, or Roku. You can also find it in the Apple or Android app store listed as "DCE TV" or "DCE Network."

Read more about the new show from the Government of the District of Columbia, Office of Cable Television, Film, Music, and Entertainment:

The premiere will be available for streaming exclusively on the free global platform DCE (District of Columbia Entertainment), bringing a delightful blend of comedy and local talent to audiences worldwide.

Set in the heart of Northeast Washington, “Union” was filmed at the iconic Union District Oyster Bar and is one of the first sitcoms about a bar filmed in an actual, operating bar. The debut of boasts industry veterans, along with a stellar cast of talented local creatives to deliver an entertaining and engaging viewing experience. It promises to deliver a fresh and hilarious take on life in Washington, DC showcasing the unique charm, humor, fellowship and diverse perspectives of the local community. Through its engaging characters, relatable storylines, and top-notch performances, the pilot aims to captivate audiences worldwide, highlighting the rich cultural tapestry of the region.

Directed by LaToya Foster, Director of OCTFME, "Union" reflects DC's creative prowess. Foster expressed pride in the OCTFME production team and the DC creatives who have contributed to the series. "Union," the first scripted series produced by OCTFME, celebrates the city's dynamic cultural scene.

Emmy-award-winning actor and comedian Tommy Davidson headlines the "Union" cast, infusing his comedic genius and energy into the show. Joining him are veteran actors Earnest Thomas, known for his iconic role as Roger "Raj" on "What's Happening!!" and "Everybody Hates Chris," and the talented Shar Jackson, recognized for her role as "Niecy" on the popular sitcom "Moesha." Additionally, two-time Pro Bowler and Super Bowl champion Vernon Davis, formerly of the San Francisco 49ers, Denver Broncos, and Washington Commanders, adds his star power to the ensemble cast.
